text: phraxngkh thrng srang phwk cea cak chiwit hnung læw cak chiwit nan thrng thahı pen khxng khukhrxng khxng man læa thrng prathan psusatw pæd taw pen khu kæ phwk cea phraxngkh thrng srang phwk cea nı khrrph khxng marda phwk cea penkar bangkeid khrang læw khrang lea xyu nı khwam mud sam chan nan khux xallxhˌ phracea khxng phwk cea phra xanac pen siththi khxng phraxngkh mimi phracea xun dı thi theiyngthæ nxkcak phraxngkh læw thami phwk cea cung phin hna pi thang xun
